snippet.title: SuperPower 3 - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
You've always wanted to govern or even rule the world? Now you can, in SuperPower 3!

Challenge your knowledge about demography, economics, military strategy, as well as social and political issues across the globe in the most complete and accurate geopolitical simulation game to date. 

Solve real-life conflicts, with solutions no-one previously thought possible, and see what effect this might have on the world. Can you change history?

- Links & Info -
Steam: https://thqn.net/superpower3-steam
Website: https://superpower3.com
Discord: https://discord.gg/superpower

- Our Socials -
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/THQNordic
Twitter: https://twitter.com/THQNordic
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/THQNordic
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/thqnordic
Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/thqnordic

#SuperPower3
